      • formatFieldSplit

        protected void formatFieldSplit(String field,
                    String patter)
        Format the Entry's field splitting the value by patter Replace the field value by an ArrayList Object
        Parameters:

        patter - The split patter to by used

      • formatFieldArrayListSplit

        protected void formatFieldArrayListSplit(String field,
                             String pattern,
                             String regex,
                             String keyEnd,
                             String oldCharOnKey,
                             String newCharOnKey)
        Format the Entry's field splitting the value by regex and extract from the result the petter as a new key * Replace the field value by an ArrayList Object which includes ArrayList elements with 2 elements: The first element is the new key and the second element the rest of the data
        Parameters:
        field - The Entry's field name
        pattern - The split patter to by used
        regex - The regular expression to extract the new key
        keyEnd - The string considered to end the key selection
        oldCharOnKey - The string into the key that should be replaced by the newCharOnKey
        newCharOnKey - The string into the key that is used to replaced by the oldCharOnKey

      • extractPatternFromField

        protected void extractPatternFromField(String field,
                           String pPrefix,
                           String pSubject,
                           String pSubfix,
                           String newPrefix,
                           String newSubfix)
        Format the Entry's field splitting the value by a ArrayList object of extracted pattern
        Parameters:
        field - The Entry's field name
        pPrefix - The pattern prefix
        pSubfix - The patter to be extracted
        pSubject - The pattern subfix
        newPrefix - The new prefix to be add to the extracted pattern
        newSubfix - The new subfix to be add to the extracted pattern

      • formatFieldReplace

        protected void formatFieldReplace(String field,
                      String oldChar,
                      String newChar)
        Format the Entry's field replace the oldChar value
        Parameters:
        field - The Entry's field name
        oldChar - Old string to be delete
        newChar - New string to be inserted

        WID - The Other WID value
